attributes.action: Explain the point of this petition system bearing in mind that you have already signalled your intention to ignore one that attracted 1.8 million signatures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition system costs money to adminster, money that is completely wasted if your government ignores the results.

rejection.details: This is not the right forum for your request please email - Team@petition.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
